description: In the following square array numbers are entered like this a(1,1),a(1,2),a(2,1),a(3,1),a(2,2),a(1,3),a(1,4),a(2,3),a(3,2),a(4,1),a(5,1),a(4,2),... such that every entry is the geometric mean of the two diametrically opposite neighbors (wherever a pair exists). 1 2 4 8 16 32 64... 3 6 12 24 48 96 192... 9 18 36 72 144 288 576... 27 54 108 216 432 864 1728... ... Sequence contains numbers as they are entered.
